metadata.title: Sakkas Lady Mary Jacquard Corset Style Bodice Lightweight Handkerchief Hem Dress
features: One Size: ( Fits Approximately US Sizes 0 - 14 ) Length: 42" ( Measured from Center Back to Longest Hem ) One Size Plus: ( Fits Approximately US Sizes 12 - 2X ) Length: 42" ( Measured from Center Back to Longest Hem )
Sakkas' rayon cotton blend dresses fit and flatter a wide range of body types. The cotton rayon blend fabric is soft, comfortable, drapes beautifully and is available in a variety of rich colors.
Features an adjustable corset lace up tie, adjustable shoulder straps and a smocked back to customize the fit to your shape.
Unique design features rich solid colors, jaquard panel corset style bodice, smocked back panel for a better fit, delicate trim, jaquard accent and a full double layer handkerchief hem skirt.
Hand Wash Separately in Cold Water. Line Dry. Imported. | Material: 55% Cotton / 45% Rayon
description: Sakkas' cotton rayon blend dresses feature lightweight fabric, delicate details, beautiful rich colors and easy comfortable style. Enjoy wearing a flattering feminine dress without sacrificing comfort!

Sakkas offers trendy designer inspired fashion at deep discounts! We work day and night to bring you high quality clothing and accessories for a fraction of the price you pay at department stores.Our incredible deals sell fast, so don't wait!
